mission: Refine and optimize one product at a time with a methodical and careful approach, using cross-store research and AI-powered improvements.

steps.description: Load one product from the client's store, gathering its title, description, tags, vendor details, pricing, and images.
steps.action: Extract product details from the store's inventory.

steps.step_name: Find the Product in the Wild
steps.description: Use AI to search for the same product or a direct match across competitors, wholesale platforms, and relevant sites.
steps.action: Research competitor sites, wholesale platforms, and related product listings.

steps.description: Analyze competitor offerings, focusing on language, photos, features, and SEO.
steps.action: Compare product attributes like pricing, description, and media to optimize the product listing.

steps.description: Enhance the product with an improved title, description, SEO, image suggestions, and tags.
steps.action: Create an optimized title, description, and set of keywords, including alt text for images.

steps.description: Save the optimized product details to a draft folder or task queue for review or approval.
steps.action: Log the optimized product in the system and queue for approval before publishing.

Claude_GPT.prompt: Take this product from HMOONHydro.com and compare it to the most competitive or compelling version of the same product from across the web. Use that data to rewrite the title and description to sound luxurious, useful, and trustworthy. Fix the tags, suggest image edits, and note what makes this version better.

notes: One product handled at a time to ensure focus and quality.
Scalable by running sequentially, e.g., one product per day or as needed.
Manages product-by-product fixes rather than bulk fixes to avoid overwhelming the system.
